name: SURGICAL SPIRIT
description:
IT IS ALSO USED FOR SKIN PREPARATION BEFORE INJECTION.

Surgical spirit is applied to the surface of the skin for use as a cleansing agent and it also has antiseptic properties.
usage:
Apply to the affected area using cotton wool as required.
Wet a swab of cotton wool with surgical spirit and apply to the skin.
storage_instructions: Store in a cool, dry place, away from flames or heat.
warnings: Highly flammable. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.

name: KLINSAFI
description: Gives your flooring a sparkling new look. Safe for tiles and marble flooring. Environmentally safe. Pleasing fragrance. Ideal viscosity for optimum use & NO misuse. Does not harm the fillers of the tiles. Absorbs dirt and grime in no time
usage: Cleans flooring, removes dirt and grime, safe for tiles and marble.
mechanism_of_action: Absorbs dirt and grime, tough on grease but gentle on hands.
indications: Safe for use on tiles and marble. Provides a sparkling new look.
storage_instructions: Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight.
warnings: Keep out of reach of children. Avoid ingestion and contact with eyes.

name: LIQUID DETERGENT
description: Discover the excellent cleaning performance of KLINSEPTS MULTI USAGE LIQUID DETERGENT with Spotless Cleaning, Fabric Protection and Fresh Lemon Fragrance. With the special effect in its formula, it provides spotless cleaning on your clothes, while at the same time, it leaves a fresh scent on your clothes.
usage: Removes dirt, grease, grime, and soil. Can be used for cleaning furniture, mopping floors, dishwashing, and laundry.
presentation: 5 Litres filled in high-density plastic jerricans.
mechanism_of_action: Effectively dissolves in water to penetrate stains faster and more efficiently.
indications: Gentle on hands, tough on dirt, versatile for multiple cleaning purposes.
storage_instructions: Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight.
warnings: Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water.

name: KLINDISH
description: Contains a strong cleaning agent, to remove oil & dirt from all surfaces. Does not contain any harmful/corrosive chemical. Environment & eco-friendly. Pleasing fragrance. Ideal viscosity for optimum use & NO misuse. Can be used on ALL utensils, glass, steel, aluminium, plastic etc. Advantage of not using soap bar which generally gets soggy. No adverse effect on human hands.
usage: Removes oil and dirt from utensils, glass, steel, aluminum, and plastic surfaces.
mechanism_of_action: Contains strong cleaning agents but is safe for human hands.
indications: Eco-friendly, non-corrosive, no adverse effects on human hands.
storage_instructions: Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight.
warnings: Keep out of reach of children. Avoid ingestion and contact with eyes.

name: KLINSAN
description:
Use Klinsan to help reduce bacteria that potentially can cause disease.

For use when soap and water are not available
usage: Wet hands throughly with the solution.Rub over the hands till they are dry.Instant results,No water,No towels.Do not wash off after use
storage_instructions: Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight.

name: KLINWASH
description: Contains a strong cleaning agent, but is gentle on hands. Enhanced with moisturiser. Does not contain any harmful/ corrosive chemical. Environment & eco-friendly. Pleasing fragrances. Ideal viscosity, so as to spread on the palm evenly.
usage: Handwash for daily use. Enhanced with moisturizers.
presentation:
Citron,
Apricot,
Strawberry,
Ocean Breeze,
Fraise,
Raspberry,
Morning Flesh,
Sweet Almond,
Peach,
Lavendor,
Aleovera,
Mixed Fruit
mechanism_of_action: Cleans effectively without harming the skin.
storage_instructions: Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight.
warnings: Keep out of reach of children. Avoid ingestion and contact with eyes.

name: KLINTOL
description:
KLINTOL SOLUTION Contains Chloroxylenol 4.8% which is an antimicrobial.

It's used in treating cuts, bites, stings, and abrasions, and used as an antiseptic hand cleane
usage:
Chloroxylenol is an antimicrobial used to treat cuts, bites, stings and abrasions.

Chloroxylenol, or para-chloro-meta-xylenol (PCMX), is an antiseptic and disinfectant agent used for skin disinfection and surgical instruments.

ALWAYS DILUTE THE PRODUCT BEFORE USE.
mechanism_of_action:
As a phenol antiseptic, it is believed that the hydroxyl-OH groups of the chloroxylenol molecule bind to certain proteins on the cell membrane of bacteria, and disrupt the membrane so as to allow the contents of the bacterial cell to leak out.

This allows chloroxylenol to enter the bacterial cell to bind further with more proteins and enzymes to disable the cell’s functioning.

At particularly high concentrations of chloroxylenol, the protein and nucleic acid content of targeted bacterial cells become coagulated and cease to function, leading to rapid cell death.
indications: The predominant medical applications for which chloroxylenol is formally indicated for therapeutic use is as an application to the skin for use in cuts, bites, stings and abrasions.
dilution_instructions:
For cuts, bites, abrasions and insect stings:
Wash the area with one tablespoon of KLINTOL solution diluted in half a pint of water and cover it with dry gauze or lint.

Personal hygiene:
For douching (when medically advised) two teaspoonfuls of KLINTOL solution in two pints of warm water.

Dandruff:
One tablespoonful of KLINTOL solution in one pint of warm water.
Saturate hair and scalp for 10 minutes then shampoo.
storage_instructions: Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight.
warnings: Keep out of reach of children. Dilute before use

name: WINDOW CLEANER
description: Our window cleaner solution is a specialized liquid formula designed to effectively clean glass surfaces, leaving them streak-free, clear, and sparkling. It is commonly used for cleaning windows, mirrors, glass tables, and other similar surfaces.

name: KLINDAN
description: KLINDAN solution contains Glutaraldehyde which is a well-known sterilizing and disinfecting agent. This solution is buffered to maintain the solution at a specific pH range during use.
usage: Disinfection of medical devices, surgical and medical equipment, endoscopes, and sensitive equipment.
mechanism_of_action:
A number of mechanisms have been invoked to explain the biocidal properties of glutaraldehyde.
Like many other aldehydes, it reacts with amines and thiol groups, which are common functional groups in proteins.
Being bi-function, it is also a potential crosslinker.
indications:
It is used as a cold sterilizer to disinfect a variety of heat-sensitive instruments, such as endoscopes, dialysis equipment, and more.

It is used as a high-level disinfectant for those surgical instruments that cannot be heat sterilized.

Contact times of at least 20 minutes (at or above 20°C) are effective for high-level disinfection.

Do not dilute the product.

Clean and then soak in klindan solution in a container.
dilution_instructions:
A powdered buffer, included with the liquid disinfectant, is added to the liquid, the pH becomes alkaline and the 2 percent glutaraldehyde is activated.
Upon the addition of the powder, the container must be shaken so it will dissolve completely.
The active solution has to be discarded after 14 days
because of polymerization
storage_instructions: Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight.
warnings:
Glutaraldehyde is an irritant to the skin, eyes, and respiratory system.

Glutaraldehyde is an irritant to the skin, eyes, and respiratory system.

Skin contact may cause minor irritation with itching and slight local redness.

Prolonged contact causes mild to moderate local redness and swelling.

Glutaraldehyde may cause a sensation by inhalation.
In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with plenty of water and seek medical advice.

Use in well-ventilated area

name: KLINJAV
description: KLINJAV (Sodium hypochlorite) commonly known as bleach, is most frequently used as a disinfecting agent. It is a broad-spectrum disinfectant that is effective for the disinfection of viruses, bacteria, fungi, and mycobacterium
usage:
As a bleaching agent:
Sodium hypochlorite causes a chemical reaction called oxidation when they come into contact with certain stains, certain germs or other organisms, and sometimes clothing dyes.
Bleach is a very useful chemical both around the house
and for large-scale use.
You can use bleach to remove stains on clothing or to whiten your laundry.

To disinfect surfaces:
Sodium Hypochlorite is used to disinfect surfaces, too, especially in the kitchen and bathroom.
Hospital personnel use Sodium Hypochlorite as a disinfectant, hotels use it to clean and disinfect bed linens and surfaces, and restaurants disinfect food preparation surfaces with Sodium Hypochlorite.
presentation: 5 Litres and 1 Litre packed in opaque high-density plastic jerricans.
mechanism_of_action: Sodium hypochlorite attacks proteins in cells, leading to microbial death.
indications: Effective against bacteria, viruses, fungi, and mycobacterium.
dilution_instructions:
For its effective use, below is the dilution table for concentrated KLINJAV Solution.

Hands, floor, bathroom, toilets etc.:
100ml diluted to 5L with water.

Operation theatres, stretchers, emergency wards, laboratories:
250ml diluted to 5L with water.

TB sputum disinfection and surfaces contaminated with spilt blood and body fluids:
500ml diluted to 5L with water.

Highly contaminated surfaces, HIC, Hepatitis B Virus inactivation:
1L diluted to 5L with water.

Patients’ clothes, linen etc (whitening):
50ml diluted to 5L with water.
storage_instructions: Do not store near reactive chemicals. Vent containers if heated.
warnings: Keep out of reach of children. Avoid mixing with ammonia or acids.

name: KLINSAV
description: Powerful disinfecting agent and antiseptic for hospital and household use.
usage:
Always dilute the product as per the recommendations below to avoid skin irritation.

Cleansing and disinfection of equipment and metal instruments.
Clean instruments disinfection.
Storage of thermometres.
30 minutes immersion.
Take 10 ml of KLINSAV SOLUTION and dilute to 60 ml with water.

Cleansing/ disinfection of equipment, catheters, rubber appliances and thermometers:
Take 10ml of KLINSAV SOLUTION and dilute with 60 ml with water.

Emergency disinfection of clean instruments, disinfection of thermometer:
20 minutes immersion.
Take 10 ml of KLINSAV SOLUTION and dilute to 60 ml with alcohol 96%.

Cleansing and disinfection of wounds and burns:
Take 10 ml of KLINSAV SOLUTION and dilute to 60 ml with water.

Cleansing and disinfection of wounds and burns where antimicrobial effects are required:
Take 10 ml of KLINSAV SOLUTION and dilute to 60 ml with water.

Pre-Operative skin disinfection:
Take 10 ml of KLINSAV SOLUTION and dilute to 60 ml with alcohol 7
mechanism_of_action: Take 10ml of this solution and dilute 200ml/60ml with water
indications:
KLINSAV SOLUTION contains Chlorhexidine Digluconate 0.3% & Cetrimide 3.0%

These are the active ingredients, which are responsible for the antiseptic effect of this liquid.

It is a strong antiseptic liquid that is widely used for first aid treatment.

It protects against infection by washing out dirt and debris.

It kills bacteria in cuts, grazes, and minor wounds without the need to touch sore or broken skin
dilution_instructions:
Always dilute the product as per the recommendations below to avoid skin irritation.

Cleansing and disinfection of equipment and metal instruments.
Clean instruments disinfection.
Storage of thermometres.
30 minutes immersion.
Take 10 ml of KLINSAV SOLUTION and dilute to 60 ml with water.

Cleansing/ disinfection of equipment, catheters, rubber appliances and thermometers:
Take 10ml of KLINSAV SOLUTION and dilute with 60 ml with water.

Emergency disinfection of clean instruments, disinfection of thermometer:
20 minutes immersion.
Take 10 ml of KLINSAV SOLUTION and dilute to 60 ml with alcohol 96%.

Cleansing and disinfection of wounds and burns:
Take 10 ml of KLINSAV SOLUTION and dilute to 60 ml with water.

Cleansing and disinfection of wounds and burns where antimicrobial effects are required:
Take 10 ml of KLINSAV SOLUTION and dilute to 60 ml with water.

Pre-Operative skin disinfection:
Take 10 ml of KLINSAV SOLUTION and dilute to 60 ml with alcohol 70%
storage_instructions: Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight.
warnings: When used as an antiseptic liquid as recommended, it does not cause any side effects. However, if used for cuts and wounds or as an after-shave lotion without diluting, it may cause mild irritation and sting on the skin but no major side effects.

name: KLINGEN
description:
Klingen solution (Hydrogen peroxide) is a mild antiseptic.

It's used on the skin to prevent infection of minor cuts, scrapes, and burns.
usage:
Mouthwash:
In low concentrations, hydrogen peroxide can be used as a mouth rinse to remove mucus or minor mouth irritations.
Wound disinfection:
Hydrogen peroxide (H2O2) is a topical antiseptic used in wound cleaning which kills pathogens through oxidation bursts and local oxygen production.
A proper level of Hydrogen Peroxide is considered an important requirement for normal wound healing.
This product should not be used to treat deep wounds, animal bites, or serious burns.
mechanism_of_action:
Hydrogen peroxide exhibits antimicrobial properties against most forms of microorganisms, including dormant forms with known high resistance profiles, such as bacterial spores and protozoal cysts.

It acts as an oxidative biocide to generate free radical species to induce DNA, protein and membrane lipid damage via oxidation.

The production of free hydroxyl radicals in the Fenton reaction is thought to be the basis of the biocidal actions of hydrogen peroxide.

Free radicals eventually lead to oxidative damage to proteins and membrane lipids in vivo.

The oxidizing radical as the ferryl radical induces DNA oxidation
indications:
Inhalation:
Seek fresh air. If the victim’s breathing is difficult, administer oxygen. If breathing is absent, give artificial respiration and seek medical attention immediately.

Eye Contact:
Remove contact lenses if present. Immediately flush your eyes with plenty of water for at least 15 minutes, and seek medical attention.

Skin Contact:
Flush skin with plenty of water and cover irritated skin with an emollient. Remove contaminated clothing. In case of serious skin exposure, use disinfectant soap and an anti-bacterial cream and seek medical attention.
Ingestion:
Do NOT induce vomiting. Loosen tight clothing. Never give anything by mouth to an unconscious person. Seek medical attention.
dilution_instructions:
FIRST AID:
To arrest bleeding and disinfect wounds. Dilute an equal amount of water, apply the diluted solution to lint or cotton wool and cleanse the wound.

Removal of wound dressings:
Dilute with an equal amount of water, soak in diluted solution, leave for a few minutes, and remove the dressing.

Mouthwash and deodorant:
Dilute two spoonfuls to one glass of water and gargle.
storage_instructions: Store in a well-closed container. In a dry place below 30°C.
warnings: Do not use it in the eyes or apply it over large areas of the skin.
